remarks: Closure of a group sum in a submonoid.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumsubmcl as of 3-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumsubmclOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumsubmclOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumsubmclOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumsubmclOLD.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) $.
gsumsubmclOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
gsumsubmclOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumsubmclOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. S ) $.
